description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. ToyBorgs is a fast paced 2D party game, supporting local and online sessions through Xbox LIVE for up to 4 players. It offers 4 different robots, each with its own special ability and 10 different maps in several locations.
description.short: ToyBorgs is a fast paced 2D party game, supporting local and online sessions through Xbox LIVE for up to 4 players. It offers 4 different robots, each with its own special ability and 10 different maps in several locations.
